content.body: Does anyone else have difficulty applying suggestions in reviews on tc39/ecma262 pull requests? If I click the “Commit suggestion” button, GitHub gives this error: “This diff has recently been updated. Refresh and try again.”
yeah it's a known github bug for as long as I can remember
something to do with when the person leaving the suggestion has commit rights to the target repo or something, it's really strange
I thought it was a misleading message that was actually caused by the large file size and would not manifest against e.g. README.md/CONTRIBUTING.md/etc.
i guess it's possible that they fixed the original bug but it still manifests with the same error message for large documents
That free ad space in the embedded preview due to the accidental URL…
